website_summaries.verdict: A good smart padlock meant to make it difficult to lose access or a key to the lock.
pros: Made of stainless steel and aluminum alloy for durability
Small enough to be used in a variety of locations like at the gym or on a bike
Water-resistant enough to be used outdoors in wet weather
cons: Fingerprint scanner can require a couple of tries to unlock the padlock

customer_reviews.title: Sketchy - Serious Privacy Concerns!
customer_reviews.text: The actual lock seems nice and convenient. HOWEVER, the app you're required to use is very sketchy. It requires permission to access your camera, location, files, phone, and a bunch of other things. If you deny any of the permission the app will not work. The user agreement you agree to by signing up states that the company can use "non-personal" information like your texts, audio, and video. NO THANK YOU! I don't feel comfortable using this device.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Hirst

customer_reviews.title: Charge then Unplug The Device for Set Up
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I purchased it for a gym locker and it is fantastic. It took a while to download the app, its translation to English, and to set up the fingerprint ID (about 20 minutes). You cannot set up the fingerprint ID while the device is charging. It must be unplugged.
customer_reviews.author: G. Brevard

customer_reviews.title: Bought two will be buying another one my kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought one then got another. I got this for my son and he loves it You download the app and it tells you how much battery life each time you open it. It says it holds a charge for about 30 days we found that it actually is longer My son said while everyone else was doing their dials and twist i he was in and out fast. You can add more than one fingerprint we found that to be helpful
customer_reviews.author: MommaZ123

customer_reviews.title: This works great and has a lot more potential than what we use ours for.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this lock. We have all of our gas powered lawn equipment locked in a cage so that our Grandkids can’t get their hands on them. We have about 5 or 6 people who help us occasionally with felling trees, trimming weeds & hedges, mowing or just need to borrow these tools. Passing out that many keys is not convenient. Now anyone I’ve added fingerprints for in the app can just walk up and unlock the cage.
customer_reviews.author: Steve in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Works great, responsive and light.
customer_reviews.text: Since I saw it on TV I already knew I’ll get it someday. That’s a perfect solution for gyms and clubs when you don’t want to take your keys with you. Easy access, fast communication with my phone and touch is very responsive. It feels very light and people say that’s it’s very fragile but they forget that all locks in this size are fragile and relatively easy to break. Just remember not to lock your fancy Tesla with that and you’ll be ok. ;)
customer_reviews.author: LoLa

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 2 months now i am locked out of my locker. App says failed to unlock and there is no faqs on this and tech support couldn't figure out why it would blink blue as if it were unlocking but wouldnt
customer_reviews.author: Johnathon Day

customer_reviews.title: Nice tech, could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Some reviews say it doesn't work. There was an initial lag in connecting via bluetooth, and bluetooth connection completely drops once you walk away from them. But they work via fingerprint just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Irvinfitz

customer_reviews.title: Completely Useless
customer_reviews.text: Charged it. Tried to add fingerprint. Took forever to add and then it didn't recognize it. Terrible. Terrible. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Can't use lock without the app but app won't allow you to register the lock and the app info on the play store is in Chinese.
customer_reviews.author: C. Outsey

customer_reviews.title: Needs help!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on fingerprint locks and decided on this one. As others have said, the included directions are terrible. As instructed in said directions, I downloaded the app (OKLOK) and set up my fingerprint. The other day at the gym I tried more than 10 times, but couldn’t get it to open. Luckily I had my phone to open it. Everyone says you can enter multiple fingerprints, but that app only allows one. I tried using Nokelock, but it doesn’t recognize my lock for some reason. I’m on the edge of returning it. 😥
customer_reviews.author: RPS

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long.
customer_reviews.text: We used this for our front gate. It has already gone bad and won't work on a full charge. I gave two stars because when it did work it was so convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not real secure.
customer_reviews.text: Lock works but the app doesn't work well and kept erroring out. App is in Chinese. Lock is ok to keep something locked from prying eyes but could easily be popped open by hitting it with a hammer or something.
customer_reviews.author: Baron

customer_reviews.title: Works but wonky
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold a full charge. In fact, I keep getting different numbers on what % is still remaining no matter how long I charge it for. And impossible to open when raining. I had to get my phone which was luckily charged but if you’re on the outside without the phone in the rain, good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Great Scott

customer_reviews.title: Security Risk?
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item. I added the app to my phone. It asked to add an account using email or phone number. I entered an email, A verification code was required. I clicked on SEND for the verification code. Then prior to the Verification Code, or account creation, The app wanted access on my phone to Photos, Media, Files, Manage Phone Calls, Pictures and Record Video. This was all prior to the account creation. Not worth the risk.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Moyer

customer_reviews.title: 🔒My forever lock for the gym!🔒
customer_reviews.text: 💪🏻I lost so many lock keys and forgot passwords too, when I saw this lock I had to have it, I even get compliments at the gym for it, this is the most convenient lock ever!🗝🗝🗝 👍🏻Once you set up, and register you can delete the app from your phone, to reconfigure again, you download the app again, there is not need to have the app in your phone all the time 😍It is worth the price, I do not have to stress over keys or passwords anymore⭐ I was a bit worried about the set up but it was really quick as you'll see on the video.
customer_reviews.author: MediaBoxEnt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but.....
customer_reviews.text: Nice lock....shaft is a bit thinner than I would like but it's good quality. The app? Needs improvement! How? I wish it would send notifications in real time (warning beeps??) When someone is trying to fool with the lock. I also wish it would take a photo fingerprint of whoever is trying to open it so you have evidence of tampering. Just my 2 cents! Would I buy it again? Yes but it's not heavy duty enough for valuables or anything like that. They need the above suggestions for like a storage facility lock....
customer_reviews.author: MinceNoWordsGirl

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service, but this is not for me
customer_reviews.text: App would not allow me to register so I could set up the lock. Instructions are poorly written and incomplete. I shouldn’t have to work that hard to use a simple gym locker lock. I returned it. Seller did contact me to offer a replacement or alternative lock. They seem very anxious to help make it right. I’m just not interested in a lock that takes that much of my time. Others seem to be happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: deborah m smith

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I tried to make this work. Downloading the app was fairly easy but I had to give permission to let this app have access to my location, data files, pics, messages, phone calls and pretty much everything....feels very wrong and like spy-ware big-time! I programmed my finger and those of my family. The lock will sometimes require up to 12 tries to finally get it to work. The concept is great but this thing is junk from across the sea. I'm sending it back and bought the igloohome smart product padlock, while it cost more, you can feel the quality and it works solid....and without accessing all your personal files on your phone!
customer_reviews.author: Z. Reisman

customer_reviews.title: Not flawless. Still worth it
customer_reviews.text: Here's the thing: connectivity is not what I'm looking for. The setup might be unpolished, and who knows what information the app takes from you, but I set it up once, deleted the app, and didn't think about it again. All I wanted was a lock that opened using my fingerprint, and it does just that. Battery life is excellent, I plug it in when I remember (gym use ~3x per week, but I don't charge very often). I usually swim and the reader doesn't recognize wet hands, but towel them off and its fine. Only other minor annoyance is the pin is on the unconventional side and some lockers aren't ergonomically perfect for that, but it still works anyway.
customer_reviews.author: J. LaFarge

customer_reviews.title: Lock is fine, app is terrible - which means it doesn't always work.
customer_reviews.text: The lock is well made and does function when you put your finger on it. However the app, which is where you get the functionality of adding multiple persons and tracking who used the lock at what time, is nonfunctional. It crashes every time you try to use it to track history, and is unreliable at adding new people, making the lock less useful than the hardware itself could be. Disappointed that I chose this one based on Amazon's recommendations for that reason. And I bought TWO - so that I could charge one while the other was on the locker - so I'm out quite a bit of money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shuman

customer_reviews.title: Update Review
customer_reviews.text: Nice lock, bought 3 of them. After no problems at all in the initial setup it doesn’t recognize my wife’s fingerprint .. no Biggy, i just add her again.. I thought. None of the 3 locks are able to connect via Bluetooth to my iPhone, iPad , my wife’s iPhone .. so i can’t add another set of fingerprints. Bummer .. so for now, we can use them , just for one my wife has to come and get me .. weird Update: Seller contacted my contacted my after I posted question, ran me through some possible solutions and then send me replacement without costs ... works now !
customer_reviews.author: Freakkater

customer_reviews.title: Kinda buggy
customer_reviews.text: ***Update*** The company reached out to me and sent me a new lock and this one is working great and was easy to set up this time. The App is now speaking in English and have had no issues so far. Only giving it 4 stars as you will need to have a USB charger to plug the provided cord into when charging. Extremely hard to set up and the app speaks in Chinese or something of the sorts. I did finally get it set up but it's kinda buggy and makes me fear to lock something up with it in fear that it won't open. Maybe I got a bad device?
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The lock is lightweight, easy to set up (I have an iPhone Xr), and seems pretty secure. I set it up to read my right thumb. It won't unlock when I present my other fingers. It only takes about a second or two to read and unlock when I put my right thumb on the reader, much faster and more convenient than using a combo lock. I should have gotten this thing a while ago. I just have to remember to keep it charged. I don't know if it gives you some kind of prompt when the battery gets low.
customer_reviews.author: Joaquin P. Cunanan

customer_reviews.title: App is poorly designed, lock works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Unsurprisingly, the app is pretty painful to use but the lock works fine. Once it's set up it feels too easy. Gladly I will only be using the app to register fingerprints and maybe check the battery strength from time to time. I was expecting the lock to have a thicker shackle, but otherwise, it has a decent build quality and looks pretty elegant. I've got it outside on the side gate to my backyard. I can't speak to the battery life or how it holds up in the elements over time but will try to report back. So far I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Stauber

customer_reviews.title: Ideal padlock
customer_reviews.text: Failed to work about 6month. Doesn’t recognize my fingerprint at all. It works as intended. The fingerprint sensor is a little touchy, but that should be expected. Battery life seems like it will be very good. My lock has been in place a couple weeks now and the app Is still. Showing the battery at 95%. The only caution is that the lock opening is not that large. It works for my locker at work, probably backpacks or carry on luggage, but anything requiring a larger opening may be suspect.
customer_reviews.author: Charles & Luis

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. Just received this. Opened it and followed very easy instructions. Registration on the app was a breeze. The lock connected to Bluetooth no problem. I set up my fingerprint no problem. Here’s where it gets 2 stars... I tried to register another fingerprint (my dad’s) and it wouldn’t do anything, multiple times. I undid my fingerprint and tried to reset it, wouldn’t do mine either. Then I tried to unlock it from the app and it wasn’t connected anymore. Will be sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: SDub

customer_reviews.title: 1st lock had to be replaced
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well for about a month now the bluetooth won't connect to my phone and the finger print sensor doesn't work either, after writing a bad review customer service reached out to me and sent a new lock. After a few weeks the new lock no longer works anymore. 2 locks, didn't last more than a month or two. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: More Geek than Security
customer_reviews.text: The required software for your phone uses libraries commonly used by malware authors. Don't know if the software itself is malware, but it uses the same tools. If you happen to have detection software on your device just beware. The fingerprint reader is adequate for most purposes, just don't plan on it recognizing your prints if after a heavy sweaty workout or particularly after swimming or otherwise wet from long shower or spa exposure. I agree with most other users, adequate for locker room use or where determined thieves can't operate on it without being immediately noticed.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Nephilim

customer_reviews.title: Intermittent failures
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind that this is a low cost version of this technology. I really like the idea, and when it works it is great. I run a business with a need to keep gates secured, but would like to get them open one handed and not have to dig for a key. This lock seemed like a solution but one failure is one too many. Charge level was 94% on the first failure. I kept it on another week and had another failure.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Had to use Cutters to unlock
customer_reviews.text: Blutooth doesn't connect to the lock - maybe 50% of the time at best. Lock refuses to recharge so if battery drains while locked, you're SOL. Thankfully, the small emergency wasn't life or death that forced me to use cutters to get the lock unlocked because the app and the fingerprint identification both were not working. What good is a lock if it doesn't recharge? Technology idea is good. Actual application is not. Go back to the drawing board!
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Declercq

customer_reviews.title: Interesting bluetooth padlock, works good so far, however no Apple HomeKit integration
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this padlock because of Apple HomeKit compatibility. This does not have HomeKit, works solely on bluetooth and fingerprint. I downloaded the app and had no problems. I followed the instructions and charged the padlock overnight. I've been using the padlock to lock my BBQ pit to my fence to prevent it from being rolled off. I've had no problems with the Texas heat / rains and use. You have to invoke the bluetooth connectivity by tapping the fingerprint sensor on the lock. If your fingerprint doesn't work, you can use the app to unlock.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Ortiz III

customer_reviews.title: App does not work
customer_reviews.text: The setup App does not work. Continually shuts off randomly on updated iphone. Unable to share with friends or add other users to lock. Unable to use the ID log properly. The App is cheap and not functional or practical and needs to be updated immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unlock with you fingerprint or phone!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gym lock or bike like for my sons bike. You can program up to 15 users fingerprints to unlock the lock and once you download the app you can also unlock it from the app. We had another lock but kept losing the key and my oldest is in kindergarten so he isnt alway dependable at remembering a numerical code so this is a great solution! it is rechargeable and stays charged up to 30 days. You can even use a portable phone charger to charge it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great lock and techy design
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. SImple set up that can hold up to 10 different fingerprints. I use as a gym lock and have had many people ask about it. No more needing to remember my combination which was my problem to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made lock
customer_reviews.text: I bought this more as a curiosity than other, I usually don't trust that much electronic devices when it comes to security. The lock surprised me, it seems to be pretty sturdy and well made (at least sturdier than the regular keyless locks), the fingerprints are easy to register and once done you need nothing more than your fingers to open it, thing that makes it good for places that you might visit without planning and not always have the keys with you.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to secure an outdoor gate. The first unit lasted a week. I returned it; the second one lasted 2 weeks. After each unit died, it would only unlock after several minutes plugged into an external battery. Maybe it would work reliably indoors, but I would not use it anywhere egress in case of emergency is necessary.
customer_reviews.author: BreakG

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know this was a thing – glad I found it
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a large metal rolling bin for sports gear for our winter leagues. It has a handy loop on top to accommodate a lock, but I don't really want to have to remember a combination or drag a key with me. This fingerprint lock actually works flawlessly. It locks and unlocks quick and is strong enough that no one could cut through it short of a severe effort. Very pleased to have stumbled upon this – super handy.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H

customer_reviews.title: security
customer_reviews.text: To configure the lock, you need to have a cellphone to install the app OKLOK, which requires access to your cellphone's camera, location, microphone, phone, storage... If you have security concern about too much access to your phone, you can uninstall OKLOK from your cellphone after you configure the lock. You will use fingerprint to unlock it.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Chang

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to lock up my Scooter it worked fine for about a week. Then it rained. I keep my Scooter under a carport so it doesn't get direct rain it only gets splashes but apparently that enough to short this piece of junk out. Long story shot it wouldn't unlock causing me to be late to work . I had to cut it off with bolt cutters thanks for nothing
customer_reviews.author: b wisler

customer_reviews.title: Costly but excellent
customer_reviews.text: I like this. It's a clever idea, and was easy to set up. I've tested it with several fingerprints and it works as advertised. Security quality is comparable to major brands and it definitely holds a charge. Integrates well with the app. It is a little pricey hence the 4 star review. $30 is a lot to pay for a padlock; at the same time this I believe is the future of padlocks. May be best to wait another generation for the prices to fall and quality to improve even more.
customer_reviews.author: Scottso

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a fairly decent padlock. It's strong and sturdy, the flexibility of Bluetooth security is nice, but it is a bit flakey. I was familiar with this lock before I purchased so I knew it's limitations so I'm not at all disappointed. I like being able to grant, or remove, access to this for friends and relatives. It's used at our vacation location so is more convenient that trying to make sure someone has keys or a combination. It works most of the time, although like with anything bluetooth device, there can be hiccups
customer_reviews.author: llw

customer_reviews.title: Hardware good, software needs professional help.
customer_reviews.text: The OKLok app needs more work. Connections to phone's bluetooth keep failing, while setting things up. The software development needs more expertese with GUI layouts and better English. Too many priviledges are requested by the app. To do stuff, you are forced to have your Location ON. The, scannable, ID barcode is laying on the bottom of your box. The documentation is "fair", and needs better English.
customer_reviews.author: Ilanrab

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I went all the way to the range once and forgot my key. I don't feel like remembering a lock code with all the other passwords we have to have for everything. This is a no brainer and works well. I have only charged this the initial time since I bought it, so the battery seems to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Heuer

customer_reviews.title: Cool fingerprint padlock!!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even know this kind of padlock exist until I try to search. I’ll use it to my bike, our gate, my luggage, and amy other things. It does read my fingerprint. It is so easy to use. Just put your finger on the padlock and it will unlock. Also, my daughter was amazed so I will buy another one for her bike. I don’t have to worry about losing key to open this padlock.
customer_reviews.author: LoveFaithHope

customer_reviews.title: Short shelf life!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I started using the padlock and all was well for the first week, however , the response from the finger print pad started to deteriorate, I thought it may need charging and charged it, however there after it did not accept my finger print and would not unlock with the use of my phone either, I had to use a piece of metal to pry it open...
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. J. Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Great lock, and a time saver.
customer_reviews.text: I hate carrying extra keys, and don't care to memorize a combination. I hear co-workers with the sane issues, especially if they're in a rush. Can't count how many times I've forgotten a lock key because I switched from my car to my bike. Thought I'd give this a try and it's been worth every penny. I'd like to see something to show me the battery life left on it, but this has been an outstanding addition to my work life.
customer_reviews.author: Burt R.

customer_reviews.title: Childproof locks
customer_reviews.text: This lock works pretty slick! I love the smart app option to use for this lock. We use it on our snacks box to help our kids not binge eat on snacks since I have to shop for a month at a time. It was very easy to pair it with the app and my fingerprint. I also like to use it on the lock to the basement so the littlest kids don't accidentally wander down and get hurt on the steep cement steps.
customer_reviews.author: TechMama

customer_reviews.title: NOT happy!
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was absolutely thrilled. Now, after just 5 months, I cannot be more unhappy. This lock is installed on my gate, and I cannot get it off. It doesn’t recognize my fingerprint, and it won’t connect to my phone. I’ve tried running an extension cord to it and giving it a fresh charge...no luck. Tried a different charger...no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: I returned this item because the app was requesting access to my information
customer_reviews.text: The application was requesting access to my pictures, folders camera, ability to make phone calls, and this is something that you only usually see when you download free apps on Android phones not when you pay for a product or an application. That is why I returned this Chinese made padlock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST lock ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely leave reviews, but definitely felt compelled to for this product. It was one of the best purchases I’ve ever made! The last thing I want to be bothered with at the gym are worries about keys or combinations, and/or the security of my personal effects. With this lock, those things are all afterthoughts. I simply walk to my locker, hold up a finger, and unlock. It holds a charge for a long time as well. If you’re looking for a hassle free digital lock, this is a definite must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Williams

customer_reviews.title: it sucks, not waterproof. will not work outside
customer_reviews.text: this is not a heavy lock. quite light for gate or exterior use. very good for locker. instructions obviously not American in origin and not translated by English. changing my review. it sucks not waterproof, does not work when wet at all. full refund expected. app uses weird language which does not use good English convention.
customer_reviews.author: Raczor

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work for my locker and the charge did not hold long it died I almost had to have my lock cut off but I had to buy a charger battery pack and charge the lock for a little bit to get it open this is nothing but a headache. I do not recommend this lock so I returned it
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Don't trash your money...
customer_reviews.text: This lock garbage, the app is garbage, I been trying to register my lock, I,m supposed to enter a 6-15 digit code, but the various codes they sent me are only 4 digits. I'm stuck here with a useless "high tech" lock... Learn from my mistake, don't waiste your hard earn money on this piece of trash !!!
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: it works but not for android users
customer_reviews.text: i have an android phone and downloaded the app but it didnt connect to the lock by bluetooth. fortunately i had an old iphone so i tried it and it worked so easily. app needs to be improved. once you set up, i think it's easy and convenient to use this lock. fingerprint seems to work well
customer_reviews.author: Taka808

customer_reviews.title: Software is buggy
customer_reviews.text: Big issue is fingerprint reader is terrible with sweaty hands after workout. Often the software forgets the lock or will not recognize it. Stop using because of the time it took to get connect and release after a workout when fingerprint scanner could not read sweaty or prune hands.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Christeson

customer_reviews.title: App failure makes this smart lock a stupid purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The app required to use this smart lock crashes. I was able to register my own finger print. After that I could not add any others... the app keeps crashing no matter whether resetting the cache, rebooting the phone or uninstalling and reinstalling. It asks for permissions that are absurd. Smart locks I'm finding aren't what they are all cracked up to be. They are all made in China. They are all difficult to set up. Googling reviews won't help. They all tout these padlocks as the best thing since bread without crust. The technology is not ready. Buy a regular padlock and save yourselves the headache.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer remorse?

customer_reviews.title: Might work better inside
customer_reviews.text: This lock started out being cool....then one day I went to take out the trash and there was a little rain I could not get it to work. Another incident occurred when the battery was too low. Yesterday was the final straw...it was really cold this morning and I went to use it and the pink light popped on and the lock was just not responding at all. Plugged charger in and the light just stayed illuminated. I had to cut the lock off to get to the garbage bins for garbage today. I threw the lock into the bin and put the bin at the curb.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Brejcha

customer_reviews.title: May die on you and lock you out
customer_reviews.text: Purchased several locks and 2 out of 7 so far have locked me out and rendered themselves completely useless/dead despite all efforts to make it work. I don’t recommend this unless you are OK with potentially needing to saw the lock off and throw it in the garbage at some point in the future. There appears to be no other way besides fingerprint to unlock it, so in the event of it dying on you, you’ll have to cut it off.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Battery not charging after one month.
customer_reviews.text: Battery died after one month. Tried to charge and nada. Tried multiple different cords. Seemed to work good out of box, but didn't charge even the first time. Now I am stuck having to cut the lock off.. Waste.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Set up was easy. Connected quickly with my phone. Battery life is phenomenal. Charge once every 3 weeks. Durability is undetermined as I do not was to try to force it open, but having the alerts on the app when it is opened is a good feature. I’m satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Roland V Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for the first charge
customer_reviews.text: I used this padlock for the first two weeks while have charge and works really good but when I tried to charge it again (like four times with different charges) the padlock just stop working.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Lara

customer_reviews.title: battery claims 3 months. more like 3 days.
customer_reviews.text: great concept. lousy execution. bluetooth setup and usage is a crapshoot. battery lasted about 3 days and had me scrambling for a charge cable and extension cord to get my locker at work open. skip this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great when it works, then it doesn’t.
customer_reviews.text: We loved this when it worked. But it no longer works. Less than 5 months of use. $40 plus dollars wasted as it is too late for an Amazon return. Hoping the seller will make it right.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca J. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Nice little lock!
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and unlocks quick. App was easy to use, it's all in English. You can unlock it from fingerprints (can add multiple - I added 4) or you can unlock it from your phone. Only thing that would make the app/lock better is if there was a battery percent indicator of some sort. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy S.

customer_reviews.title: Works well and great solution
customer_reviews.text: Works just like I hoped it would! Just as accurate as quality phones. I don't have to remember the number code, or worry about having the key!! Set up is pretty easy, and I can set it to multiple people.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: These are magic and made for us. Big solution to a big problem.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because we moved to a house with a pool. Unfortunately the neighborhood had free reign prior to us. We needed a solution that allows people to come and go (like the pool cleaners) with our permission and the ability to track who was coming and going and when. These work wonderfully. A little difficult pairing fingerprints when the finger is cold but other than that they have been MAGIC. Brilliant product.
customer_reviews.author: Martha R Kelso

customer_reviews.title: No Numbers for Me to Not See
customer_reviews.text: My near field vision is going. This lock has improved my experience at the gym tremendously. I went from fumbling through numbers that I could not see to easy secure one step opening. The charge lasts very long. However, the USB cover can be hard to open. I wish that the lock was a bit more sturdy. I would not use it in a place where my property was in high risk.
customer_reviews.author: George Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great for work lockers, no extra keys
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my work locker I don’t have to carry any keys, the finger print works most of the time, once in a while if I get really dry hands it’s touchy but happy with it over all
customer_reviews.author: Bill Murdoch

customer_reviews.title: But something else!
customer_reviews.text: This is quite literally the worst thing I have ever bought. It's only saving grace is it had the decency to die when it was not locked on my gate. Nothing but trouble from day one.
customer_reviews.author: Jill A. Cataldo

customer_reviews.title: Requires too much access to your phone data before the lock will even work
customer_reviews.text: Why would a simple padlock need access to any data on your phone? It has 1 job. 1. Close and Open. That's it. You can't even use the lock without downloading, installing, and giving an unknown company access to the information on your phone. Absurd.
customer_reviews.author: gruntled

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend to anyone. I waste too much time trying to get my Android phone to connect to the lock. It frequently misreads my fingerprints. Today, I gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Nice locks
customer_reviews.text: They are very nice however when it rain it seems like they freeze ( in Florida summer) and stop working until you dry them off thoroughly. The app struggles to remain connected. Other than that it works well
customer_reviews.author: King Mike

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy! Snap!
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted a fingerprint lock so I can lock my camera gears and access it quickly when I'm on a job, I've been looking for one and finally found one. It's pretty easy to use. I might pick up another one to lock my fridge so no one can steal my snacks! Seriously! XD
customer_reviews.author: Tango

customer_reviews.title: Nice little lock
customer_reviews.text: There is a little metal ring that goes around the locking mechanism and it kept falling off until I lost it now I’m just afraid of water or something getting down in there. But all in all pretty nice little lock
customer_reviews.author: John Randall Sandberg

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible experience! Absolutely terrible! Two days after I received it it would not recognize my fingerprint any longer. It would not allow me to login through the app. Find something better! It’s not this one!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Very texture
customer_reviews.text: It's what I want. It's really technological. The color and shape are all good. It's strong and textural. It can be used in many places. It's really convenient for people like me who lose keys easily. I need to install an application program in my mobile phone. At first, I thought it would be troublesome to install it. The result is very smooth and simple.
customer_reviews.author: maxmiss91

customer_reviews.title: The quality seems excellent and the locks are very useful
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these locks, bought at different times. The quality seems excellent and the locks are very useful. Unfortunately the product documentation is inadequate. However, once we figured these out, they work pretty much as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph E. Dratman

customer_reviews.title: Solid lock but poor fingerprint reader!
customer_reviews.text: The lock is solid and latches securely. The charge lasts quite a while, more than a month of daily use. The only problem I have is the fingerprint reader. I have had difficulty opening the lock, sometimes taking dozens of tries to get it to recognize my fingerprint. Adding the same finger as an additional fingerprint helps but it's still unreliable, rarely opening on the first or second try.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Farley

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: very easy to set up and to make it work, I can open it by touching it or using the app at a distance and not have to even touch it! very convenient.just worry about the fact that it doe sneed to be charged by USB so idk if it does run out of battery how it works but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Buzgal

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Terrible instructions in 2-3 point type on a dark background. I don’t fault someone for English being their second language, but a Chinese company with the resources to build this could have hired someone. Some of the links from within the app go to a 404 page on a Chinese website. The company website isn’t in either Chinese or English, it’s in Spanish. I bought this because of claimed HomeKit capability, can’t find it. Also they want too much data access.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great until your prints change from swimming
customer_reviews.text: So convenient no more forgetting combinations or misplacing keys. Works great. However, since I’m a swimmer my fingers get shriveled and My prints change and I can’t open my lock until my prints get back to normal. Since it accepts multiple prints, I may try storing a shriveled print and see how that works. But do prints always shrivel the same way ??
customer_reviews.author: Lannee

customer_reviews.title: Good lock
customer_reviews.text: This is a good lock; It is very convenient to use after a long work out. Just make sure you check the battery percentage before you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Terry

customer_reviews.title: It works as expected
customer_reviews.text: For low risk situations like gym lockers or things like that it works perfectly fine, it opens fine with your registered fingerprint, phone app easy to use, first time sync was a little confusion but fine, it won't work with a web thumb which is normal with finger prints.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Madrigal

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Looks and works great. Easy to set up and use. Zero problems. Only negative relates to the map secton of the app. Its in Chinese and theres no changing it. Wish I could read it.
customer_reviews.author: Lumpy D

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: The lock stopped working about 3 mo the after I received it. Won’t hold a charge at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: my new tech product
customer_reviews.text: this lock is very stylish to me. The lock is one of my best fingerprint lock ever. It is very easy to connect and use it. i used that to lock my bike and now I don't need to carry any key or remember the password anymore
customer_reviews.author: Desmond

customer_reviews.title: Nice modern product
customer_reviews.text: This is sooooooo nice! New technology and I don’t have to worry about locking my keys In The locker! Easy to set up and slick looking
customer_reviews.author: Jaquay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gym
customer_reviews.text: It's excellent for gym locker room. Not steardy enough for no serious security uses. But it does the job Bluetooth works good to.
customer_reviews.author: neevasleep

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprint Padlock Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I use the padlock on my locker at the swimming pool. It's more convenient unlocking it without a key in my swim trunks or remembering a combination plus, as a backup, I can unlock it with a blue tooth device such my iPhone. I have also 'programmed' it to open with my wife's finger prints and iphone. Sometimes my fingerprint doesn't open it until the third or fourth attempt; perhaps my fingers aren't thoroughly dried.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence L.

customer_reviews.title: Lock
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved it. The only problem is instructions come in Chinese. He had to figure it out on his on. Good thing he's IT
customer_reviews.author: Tamrock

customer_reviews.title: Simple and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and durable feeling. Easy to set the combo for, just turn 90 degrees and twist, the same as with other locks this style. I appreciate that it's 4 digits rather than 3. Will be helpful in security my shed or back gate when on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Myst

customer_reviews.title: Smart padlock
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome and convenient I don’t have to have a combo just my fingerprint or my phone. Will see how it handles the cold and hot weather outside. Impressed with this lock so far easy setup instructions included which helped a little
customer_reviews.author: Trung H Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Finger print reads well but needs improvement on app
customer_reviews.text: the fingerprint reads pretty well. I however, had issues using the app on my android phone to unlock the padlock. The app did not let me create an account which was strange. I tried and tried without success. Another thing is that you have to charge the lock from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Tac913

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use legit product if you want good padlock buy it so far I use it for my gym locker and it is good
customer_reviews.author: Zen

customer_reviews.title: No more lost keys
customer_reviews.text: Once I figured out how to work it, it's pretty cool. Easier for my son and I to access the back yard.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. B.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job with out a key.
customer_reviews.text: Nice lock for a gym locker, I wouldn't use it for ultimate security because the lock can be cut easily. It will do the job however. Vendor quickly shipped the product and it came in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jack White

customer_reviews.title: not sturdy, but it's ok
customer_reviews.text: not sturdy, but it's ok, would also be nice to have the ability to add a second set of fingerprints
customer_reviews.author: sporting road

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I like the lock a lot, but did have an issue with it not charging after months, the seller sent me a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Cal Robert

customer_reviews.title: Buy anything else.
customer_reviews.text: This lock is awful. It almost never opened when I needed it to. Had to have it cut off at the gym so I could get my clothes. The fingerprint scanner is absolute rubbish.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Eck

customer_reviews.title: No glasses needed.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my locker at the YMCA. I have to give my fingerprint time to dry out after I have been in the pool, the lock wouldn’t work until it did.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Johnson

product_meta.title: Fingerprint Padlock, Bluetooth Connection Metal Waterproof, Suitable for House Door, Suitcase, Backpack, Gym, Bike, Office, APP is Suitable for Android/iOS, Support USB Charging
feature_bullets: 【Fingerprint unlock】- Farewell to cumbersome numbers, your finger is the key, do not have to worry about losing the key or the password is known to the thief, because they can not get your finger.
【Sturdy structure】 - The fingerprint lock body is made of aluminum alloy and the lock beam is made of stainless steel for superior cut resistance,protect your cabinet or your home against thieves.
【Widely Uses】For indoor and outdoor use, gym lockers,suitable for suitcases, golf bags, handbags, school lockers,furniture, wardrobes, bicycle and other goods that you want to protect.
【Easy to carry】-Gym lock size is so small that you can easily place it in your pocket and it is the best choice if you want to take it to the gym.

【Friendly Customer Service】-Free return within three months after purchase (we bear all transportation costs), free repair within two years.If you have any questions about the fingerprint lock, feel free to contact us. We will do our best to meet your satisfaction.Email address：unitech@omnicctv.com
